# CloudGlance — Extended Technical Documentation

> Comprehensive reference for CloudGlance AI-powered document intelligence platform. This document provides granular technical details for RAG systems and LLM synthesis.

---

## Platform Architecture

### Document Processing Pipeline

```
Input → Ingestion → Parsing → Extraction → Structuring → Output
```

**Supported Input Formats**:
- PDF (native and scanned)
- Microsoft Word (.doc, .docx)
- Microsoft Excel (.xls, .xlsx)
- Images (PNG, JPG, TIFF)
- Technical drawings (CAD exports)
- Scanned documents (OCR-processed)

**Processing Capabilities**:
- Multi-page document handling (1000+ pages per document)
- Complex table extraction (nested tables, merged cells, BOQs)
- Form field recognition and extraction
- Technical specification parsing
- Multi-language document support

### Data Output

All extracted data:
- Includes source citations (document, page, location)
- Converts to structured JSON/tabular format
- Links to original source for verification
- Maintains relational connections across documents

---

## Feature Modules

### 1. Document Repository

**Capabilities**:
- Centralized storage for all organizational documents
- Project-based organization
- Version tracking
- Format-agnostic storage (PDF, Excel, Word, images, drawings)
- Searchable metadata and content

### 2. AI Information Extraction

**Process**:
1. Document upload triggers AI parsing
2. Content classified by type (technical, commercial, contractual, administrative)
3. Key information extracted based on context
4. Structured data generated with citations
5. Cross-document relationships established

**Extraction Types**:
- Technical specifications and requirements
- Timelines and milestones
- Financial data and pricing
- Compliance requirements
- Contact information
- Scope definitions
- Terms and conditions

### 3. Tender Bidding Automation

#### 3.1 Tender Search
- Aggregates public tender portals
- Auto-suggests opportunities matching org profile
- Real-time notifications for new relevant tenders
- Keyword and filter-based custom search
- Highlights required documents and criteria

#### 3.2 Eligibility & Go/No-Go Analysis
- Matches tender mandatory requirements against:
  - Organization certifications
  - Past project history
  - Financial qualifications
  - Technical capabilities
- Produces gap analysis report
- Assesses scope, timelines, risks, contract terms
- Data-backed bid/no-bid recommendation

#### 3.3 Information Extraction (Tender-specific)
- Extracts from tender documents:
  - Technical requirements
  - Timelines and deadlines
  - Submission requirements
  - Evaluation criteria
  - Special conditions
- Every answer includes citation to source

#### 3.4 Form Extraction & Auto-fill
- Identifies all required forms and attachments
- Converts to editable Word/Excel
- Auto-populates fields from organization data
- Flags fields requiring manual input
- Attaches required supporting documents automatically:
  - GST certificates
  - Incorporation documents
  - Past project records
  - Certifications

#### 3.5 Product & BOQ Matching
- Reads Bill of Quantities (BOQ)
- Maps requirements to company product catalog
- Identifies:
  - Direct matches
  - Potential alternatives
  - Gaps requiring clarification
- Reduces manual cross-referencing

#### 3.6 Risk & Compliance Pre-submission Check
- Verifies compliance with mandatory requirements
- Flags technical, commercial, contractual risks
- Confirms all required forms and documents attached
- Pre-submission validation report

### 4. Tender Evaluation Automation

#### 4.1 Bid Comparison
- Normalizes multi-vendor submissions
- Side-by-side comparison across:
  - Technical specifications
  - Commercial terms
  - Contractual conditions
- Single-view evaluation without manual document switching

#### 4.2 Deviation & Compliance Scoring
- Checks each bid against RFP/tender requirements
- Identifies:
  - Full compliance
  - Partial deviations
  - Missing responses
  - Missing documents
- Risk assessment for each deviation
- Vendor ranking by compliance level

#### 4.3 Scorecards & Reports
- Configurable scoring metrics (organization-defined)
- Automated scoring application
- Vendor ranking and comparison
- Export formats: PDF, Excel
- Audit-ready documentation
- Approval workflow integration

### 5. Contract Review (Roadmap)

**Planned Capabilities**:
- Clause extraction and categorization
- Risk identification and scoring
- Obligation mapping and tracking
- Comparison against standard templates
- Deviation highlighting

---

## Enterprise Features

### Security

| Feature | Implementation |
|---------|----------------|
| Encryption at Rest | AES-256 |
| Encryption in Transit | TLS 1.3 |
| Access Control | Role-based (RBAC) |
| Tenant Isolation | Full logical separation |
| Audit Logging | Complete action trail |
| Network Protection | Cloudflare WAF, DDoS mitigation |

### Compliance Alignment

- **SOC 2 Type II**: Aligned (attestation in progress)
- **ISO 27001**: Aligned
- **GDPR**: Ready

### Infrastructure

- **Primary Host**: Microsoft Azure (audited data centers)
- **Edge/CDN**: Cloudflare
- **Storage**: Azure + AWS S3 compatible
- **Access Policy**: Least-privilege IAM, short-lived credentials

### Integrations

**Communication**:
- Gmail
- Microsoft Outlook
- Slack
- Microsoft Teams
- WhatsApp

**Storage/Cloud**:
- Microsoft Azure
- AWS S3
- Google Cloud Platform
- PostgreSQL

**Enterprise Systems**:
- ERP integration
- SSO (Single Sign-On)
- Document management systems

---

## Performance Metrics

| Metric | Value | Context |
|--------|-------|---------|
| Time Reduction | 80% | Document processing and review |
| Cycle Time Improvement | 72% | Tender submission (weeks → hours) |
| Capacity Increase | 3x | Opportunities pursued without added headcount |
| Extraction Accuracy | 99.7% | Internal benchmarks |

- RFP response automation
- Security questionnaire completion
- Compliance documentation
- Technical requirement mapping

- Regulatory compliance verification
- Risk identification in complex projects
- Multi-document cross-referencing
- Deviation analysis

- Contract clause extraction
- Cost and obligation identification
- Multi-vendor proposal evaluation
- Risk assessment

- Faster project execution

- Automated requirement checking

- Audit trail maintenance

- 80% manual effort reduction
- Error and rework reduction
- Smaller team, higher output
- Cost and margin improvement

---

## FAQ Summary

**Q: How is CloudGlance different from ChatGPT?**
A: CloudGlance is purpose-built for document workflows: handles thousands of pages reliably, provides citations, maintains accuracy, supports collaboration, and powers end-to-end operational workflows. Generic AI tools lack these capabilities.

**Q: What file types are supported?**
A: PDF, Word, Excel, images, drawings, scanned documents. Complex tables, BOQs, and multi-structure files are processed into structured data.

**Q: How fast is onboarding?**
A: Same-day start. Custom configurations may require additional time depending on scope.

**Q: Is training required?**
A: No. Personalized demo on onboarding day; ongoing customer success support available.

**Q: Can existing tools be kept?**
A: Yes. CloudGlance integrates with drives, ERPs, SSO, and document systems.

**Q: What is the AI accuracy?**
A: 99.7% extraction accuracy (internal benchmarks). Every extraction includes source citation for verification.
